data.enText: a law or a set of laws passed by a parliament

data.chText: 有关药物销售的新法规将于明年出台。
data.enText: New legislation on the sale of drugs will be introduced next year.
the process of making and passing laws
Legislation will be difficult and will take time.

tr: the act of making or enacting laws
law enacted by a legislative body

value.def: Legislation consists of a law or laws passed by a government.

example.ex: ...a letter calling for legislation to protect women's rights.
example.tran: 一封呼吁立法保护妇女权益的信

trans: 附属法例；附属条例；附属法规
劳动立法；劳动法规；劳工法
